modName: Hunterborn and IMCN Compatibilitypatch Englisch and German
summary: A simple compatibility patch for Hunterborn[V1.1.2] and Imp´s More Complexe Needs[V0.31] that enables IMCN to use Hunterborn´s food
descriptionHtml:
A simple compatibility patch for Hunterborn[V1.1.2] and Imp´s More Complexe Needs[V0.31] that enables IMCN to use Hunterborn´s food.
If installed, Hunterborn´s food, meat etc. get nutrition-values and become functional with IMCN.
In the RAR-archive, there are two versions of esp:

	[With Effects] Hunterborn-food keep its regeneration-values. (like Healt-Reg.)
	[Without Effects] Regeneration-values are removed, like IMCN does on vanilla-food.

Ein simpler Kompatibilitäts-Patch für Hunterborn[V1.1.2] und Imp´s More Complexe Needs[V0.31].
hunterborn-Nahrung erhält Nährwerte und kann von IMCN genutzt werden.
Das RAr-Archiv enthält zwei Versionen:

	[Mit Effekten] Hunterborn-Nahrung behält Effekte wie z.B.: Gesundheits-Regneration.
	[Ohne Effekte] Diese Effekte werden entfernt, wie bei anderen IMCN-Nahrungsmitteln.

Hunterborn in Deutsch: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46836/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46836/?[/url]


Requirements / Vorrausetzungen:
--------------------
Of course, Hunterborn(V1.1.2) and Imp´s More complexe Needs(V0.31) and all stuff they need.
[V1.1.2] of Hunterborn -- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?[/url]
[V0.31] of IMCN - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639/?[/url]

Hunterborn(V1.1.2), Imp´s More complexe Needs(V0.31) und Alles damit diese funktionieren.
[V1.1.2] Hunterborn - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?[/url]
[V0.31]  IMCN - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639/?[/url]



Installation:
--------------------
1. Be sure you got the proper versions of both Mods.
2. Download the Archiv.
3. Create a backup-savegame.
4. Extract one ESP (With Effect or Without Effects) into your "Skyrim/Data"-Folder.
5. Enable the ESP-file ie. with your Skryimlauncher.
Be sure, to load "Hunterborn - IMCN compatibility.esp" AFTER all other Hunterborn and IMCN-Plugins!
6. Run the game and have a greate good meal. ;)


Deinstallation:
--------------------
1. Create a backup-savegame.
2. Delete "Hunterborn - IMCN compatibility.esp" from your "Skyrim/Data"-Folder.
3. Run the game.


Attention:
--------------------
I noticed one bug, i can´t fix: If you cancel the consumption of hunterborn-food ("cancel meal" or "do not eat"), you won´t get the proper item back. Don´t know, if its a IMCN-Bug or my fault.



Credits:
-------------------
"Hunterborn" by unuroboros - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201/?
"Imp´s More complexe Needs" by Imp of the Perverse - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639/?
author: crcfehler
